text: The National Guard is the primary and best tool governors and the president have to support state governments during times of unrest. https://t.co/a5BG5LY0Wc https://t.co/vEmP2TDhll

text: “We believe that it is unconscionable—and a very real threat to the daily lives of all Americans—that we are currently operating under authorities that date back to before the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001.” https://t.co/GpcXmPk62F
